name: fluidcalendar
description: Fluid Calendar is a collaborative self-hosted calendar app with schedule sharing, drag-and-drop events, and multiple calendar views. Suitable for small teams or family planning with full ownership of event data.
features: Calendar: Collaborative scheduling, Drag-and-drop events, Multiple calendar views. Shared family or team planning.
Event Sharing: Coordinate schedules. Team collaboration.
Data Ownership: Your events stay private. Self-hosted control.
Multiple Views: Day, week, month layouts. Flexible viewing.
Recurring Events: Set repeating schedules. Automated planning.
Reminders: Get notified of events. Never miss appointments.
Color Coding: Categorize events. Visual organization.
Multi-Calendar: Separate work and personal. Organized life.
Export: Download calendar data. Data portability.
Mobile-Friendly: Access on all devices. Plan anywhere.
